# Overbearing Onslaught (Ex)
## Overview
*Overbearing Onslaught (Ex)*: While raging, the barbarian may overrun more than one target per round, with a â€“2 penalty on her CMB for each overrun check after the first. A barbarian must have the [[Overbearing Advance (Ex)|overbearing advance]] rage power to select this rage power. A barbarian must be at least 6th level to select this rage power.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 76
